A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the film that the Star Wars saga needed. As a die-hard fan of the franchise since my early childhood\, I respect and admire Disney and Johnson for their realist approach to the mythology\, willing and ready to defy expectations at every turn. Beyond the film's sheer narrative weight and deeply emotional moments\, it cuts into vital new territory that will keep bringing new fans to the series. Bravo. If this is where Star Wars is headed\, it's \"hit the jump to light speed\" for me.
